name: Vecwarp
author: AFNI Developers
description: Transforms (warps) a list of 3-vectors into another list of 3-vectors according to the specified options.

inputs.description: Use the AFNI dataset 'aaa' as the source of the transformation; this dataset must be in +acpc or +tlrc coordinates, and must contain the attributes WARP_TYPE and WARP_DATA which describe the forward transformation from +orig coordinates to the 'aaa' coordinate system.
inputs.name: AFNI Dataset

inputs.description: Read an affine transformation matrix-vector from file 'mmm', which must be in the specified format.
inputs.name: Affine Matrix-Vector File

inputs.description: To apply the forward transformation. If neither -forward nor -backward is given, -forward is the default.
inputs.name: Forward Transformation Flag

inputs.description: Read input 3-vectors from the file 'iii' (from stdin if 'iii' is '-' or the -input option is missing).
inputs.name: Input File

inputs.description: Write the output to file 'ooo' (to stdout if 'ooo' is '-', or if the -output option is missing).
inputs.name: Output File

inputs.description: If the output file already exists, use -force to overwrite it. If -force is used, it must come before -output on the command line.
inputs.name: Force Overwrite Flag

output-files.description: The output file containing the transformed 3-vectors.
output-files.name: Transformed Vectors Output File
